structure.unit: KENTUCKY ALCOHOL AND OTHER DRUG ABUSE PREVENTION, INTERVENTION, AND TREATMENT LAW

law.history: Repealed 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 106, Art. XII, sec. 3. -- Created 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 4, effective May 18, 1956.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Powers of commission; contracts not to constitute claim against Commonwealth; employment of medical, psychiatric, psychological, and secretarial assistance.
